Source.Name: dfu-programmer
Source.Summary: Device Firmware Update based USB programmer for Atmel chips with a USB bootloader.
Source.Description: dfu-programmer is an implementation of the Device Firmware Upgrade class USB driver that enables firmware upgrades for various USB enabled (with the correct bootloader) Atmel chips.

Package.Name: dfu-programmer
Package.Summary: Device Firmware Update based USB programmer for Atmel chips with a USB bootloader.
Package.Description: dfu-programmer is an implementation of the Device Firmware Upgrade class USB driver that enables firmware upgrades for various USB enabled (with the correct bootloader) Atmel chips.
